customer_name: Wildlife Humane Society L L C
site_name: WILDLIFE HUMANE SOCIETY L L C

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:05 pm on
26-Feb-18.
The licensee was contacted via telephone by texting; no facility representative was available for a routine
inspection. A potential new location for the facility was an item discussed by the licensee and this inspector.
